formula: a(n) = sum((m-1)!*(-1)^(n+m)*sum(stirling1(n, k)*stirling1(k, m), k,m,n), m,1,n), n>0. - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Sep 14 2010
mathematica: max = 20; CoefficientList[-Log[1 + Log[1 + Log[1 - x]]]/x + O[x]^max, x] * Range[max]! (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Feb 06 2016 *)
prog: (PARI) a(n) = sum(m=1, n, (m-1)!*(-1)^(n+m)*sum(k=m, n, stirling(n,k,1)*stirling(k,m,1))); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 06 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: Revised description from _Christian G. Bower_, Aug 15 1998
